mapper.select: SELECT P.PROAMOUNT FROM ORDERS O, PRODUCT P WHERE O.PROCODE=P.PROCODE AND ID=#{tests}

SELECT O.ID AS ID, O.EMPNO AS EMPNO, O.REGDATE AS REGDATE, S.NAME AS NAME, S.TEAM AS TEAM, S.AUTH AS AUTH, O.PROCODE AS PROCODE, P.PRONAME AS PRONAME, O.PROAMOUNT AS PROAMOUNT, ((P.SELLPRICE-P.ORIGINPRICE)*O.PROAMOUNT) AS PROFIT, O.CUSTOMER AS CUSTOMER, O.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, O.CHECKS AS CHECKS, O.DELETED AS DELETED FROM ORDERS O, (SELECT EMPNO, NAME, TEAM, AUTH FROM SMEMBER) S, (SELECT PROCODE, PRONAME, PROAMOUNT, ORIGINPRICE, SELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT) P WHERE O.EMPNO=S.EMPNO AND O.PROCODE=P.PROCODE AND DELETED=0 AND O.ID=${tests}

SELECT O.ID AS ID, O.EMPNO AS EMPNO, O.REGDATE AS REGDATE, S.NAME AS NAME, S.TEAM AS TEAM, S.AUTH AS AUTH, P.SELLPRICE, O.PROCODE AS PROCODE, P.PRONAME AS PRONAME, O.PROAMOUNT AS PROAMOUNT, ((P.SELLPRICE-P.ORIGINPRICE)*O.PROAMOUNT) AS PROFIT, O.CUSTOMER AS CUSTOMER, O.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, O.CHECKS AS CHECKS, O.DELETED AS DELETED FROM ORDERS O, (SELECT EMPNO, NAME, TEAM, AUTH FROM SMEMBER) S, (SELECT PROCODE, PRONAME, PROAMOUNT, ORIGINPRICE, SELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT) P WHERE O.EMPNO=S.EMPNO AND O.PROCODE=P.PROCODE AND CHECKS=0 AND DELETED=0 AND O.ID=#{tests}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET CHECKS=1, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE ID=#{tests}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRANSACT (ID, EMPNO, PROCODE, PROAMOUNT, TEAM, CATEGORY, PRICE, TRANSDATE, DELETED) VALUES (#{id}, #{empno}, #{procode}, #{proamount}, #{team}, '판매', #{profit}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERS SET DELETED=1 WHERE ID=#{tests}
mapper.select: SELECT EMPNO, NAME, TEAM, AUTH FROM SMEMBER WHERE TEAM!='관리팀' AND TEAM!='자재팀' ORDER BY TEAM, AUTH DESC
SELECT EMPNO, NAME, TEAM, AUTH FROM SMEMBER WHERE EMPNO=#{tests}
SELECT TEAM FROM SMEMBER WHERE AUTH!='ROLE_ADMIN' GROUP BY TEAM ORDER BY TEAM
SELECT TEAM FROM SMEMBER WHERE TEAM=#{tests} GROUP BY TEAM
SELECT EMPNO, NAME, AUTH FROM SMEMBER WHERE TEAM=#{team} ORDER BY AUTH DESC

SELECT O.ID AS ID, O.EMPNO AS EMPNO, O.REGDATE AS REGDATE, S.NAME AS NAME, S.TEAM AS TEAM, S.AUTH AS AUTH, O.PROCODE AS PROCODE, P.PRONAME AS PRONAME, O.PROAMOUNT AS PROAMOUNT, ((P.SELLPRICE-P.ORIGINPRICE)*O.PROAMOUNT) AS PROFIT, O.CUSTOMER AS CUSTOMER, O.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, O.CHECKS AS CHECKS, O.DELETED AS DELETED FROM ORDERS O, (SELECT EMPNO, NAME, TEAM, AUTH FROM SMEMBER) S, (SELECT PROCODE, PRONAME, PROAMOUNT, ORIGINPRICE, SELLPRICE FROM PRODUCT) P WHERE O.EMPNO=S.EMPNO AND O.PROCODE=P.PROCODE AND DELETED=0 ${tests}
